name: CitySwarm
tag_list: events, social-events, singles-events, social-club, cultural-events, chicago-events, group-buying, social-buying, discounts, deals, event-deals
overview:
CitySwarm offers event experiences for fun-loving Chicagoans interested in exploring the city in an easier and more social way.

There’s a million fun things to do in Chicago, but too often we don’t take advantage! It’s too time-consuming to organize, too hard to get a group together, or too expensive. There are so many options, people are flaky…really, is there anything worse than organizing an event?

Say hello to CitySwarm. CitySwarm provides a better way to explore Chicago and opens the door to unique, memorable experiences in the best city in the world.

CitySwarm events are:

> Social Since CitySwarm caters to the young professional demographic living in Chicago, our events also provide an incredible social opportunity for guests to meet new people with whom they have things in common. Whether you’re interested in networking socially or professionally, or simply being among a group of your peers, it’s easy to have fun and meet friendly people at a CitySwarm event.

> Hassle-Free CitySwarm events provide everything you need for a great experience without any of the hassle. We take care of all the little details - from transportation to tickets to food and beverage and everything in between. All you need to do is purchase your ticket, show up, and have a great time!

> Unique CitySwarm offers experiences that you just can’t get every day! Our team works hard to create unforgettable events spanning recreation, culture, dining and nightlife, digging up private access and exclusive opportunities along the way to ensure your experience is special and memorable.

> High-Value Because we travel in a group, we’re able to negotiate the best rates for every activity and pass the savings on to you. Combine this with everything we’ve mentioned above, and you can rest assured that the value of a CitySwarm event will far exceed your expectations.

In addition to our regularly-offered experiences, we also offer periodic non-for-profit group volunteering events to help our members give back to the community in an easy and fun way. We support local causes through our cross-promotion program.
